// ä¿¡æ¯çª—å£
.tip {
  width: 140px;
  height: 80px;
  border: 1px solid #00adb5;
  border-radius: 4px;
  position: relative;
  background-color: #fff;
  filter: drop-shadow(0px 2px 4px rgba(64, 158, 225, 0.9));
  &::before {
    content: '';
    width: 0;
    height: 0;
    border-style: solid;
    border-width: 0 10px 10px 10px;
    border-color: transparent transparent #fff transparent;
    position: absolute;
    top: -10px;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    margin: auto;
    z-index: 2;
  }
  &::after {
    content: '';
    width: 0;
    height: 0;
    border-style: solid;
    border-width: 0 10px 10px 10px;
    border-color: transparent transparent #00adb5 transparent;
    position: absolute;
    top: -11px;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    margin: auto;
    z-index: 1;
  }
}
